alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:46PM CDT until April 13 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR LINCOLN AND SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 746 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Lincoln, or 8 miles southwest of Brookhaven, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bogue Chitto around 750 PM CDT. Brookhaven and Enterprise around 755 PM CDT. East Lincoln around 800 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central, south central and southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
